name: Chronic Curse
description:
Description:
You have been cursed by Time itself for stepping foot in their temple. Navigate your way through the ruins by using the curse to your advantage.

Jam Details:
This game was made in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 47 Compo in October of 2020. The theme of the jam was "Stuck in a Loop." The game received the following rankings:

Category Rank (out of 800 entries) Score (out of 5) Overall 1243.774Fun 1723.595Innovation 2213.5Theme 1573.94Graphics 1683.75Audio 673.793Humor 2742.635Mood 2153.382
